name: Seamoth
description:
Like a moth drawn to light, the need for fuel keeps you going...

Discover an underwater world, while keeping a lookout for places to refuel so that you may not end stranded, deep underwater.

Small underwater exploration/puzzle game that was created for the Ludum Dare 48 game jam by  eCherry and me. 

All credit for the beautiful art goes to Cherry.

Further credit for the basis of the water shader to Gonkee.
